name: assertiveness
description: Confidently expresses opinions while remaining open to others

name: empathy
description: Shows strong understanding and consideration of others' perspectives

name: analytical
description: Approaches problems with logical and systematic thinking

name: adaptability
description: Flexibly adjusts approach based on situation and team needs

description: Balance between direct and diplomatic communication

name: agreement_tendency

name: initiative_taking
description: Frequency of starting new discussion threads
